<$list filter="[<lang>search[zh]]">

! 聚焦条目

检测你现在正在看的条目，并将其标题存在 `$:/temp/focussedTiddler`。

判定方法：当打开新条目、滚动条目至一定位置（可配置）或者点击条目内容时，及判定为聚焦条目。

> 本插件使用灵活而强大的 <$text text="TiddlyWiki" /> 开发框架 [[Tiddly.ModernDev|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/Modern.TiddlyDev]]

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search[zh]]">

! focused-tiddler

Detecting the tiddler you are viewing, and save its title to `$:/temp/focussedTiddler`.

Judgment method: When opening a new tiddler, scrolling the tiddler to a certain position (configurable) or clicking on the content of the tiddler, and judged to be a focused tiddler.

> This plugin uses the flexible and powerful <$text text="TiddlyWiki" /> development framework [[Tiddly.ModernDev|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/Modern.TiddlyDev]]

</$list>
</$list>
